articles.title: Fox analyst’s comments on Toronto amid Kevin Durant trade rumours receive backlash from Canadian fans - Toronto Star
articles.description: “Can they keep African-American superstars there?” said pundit Chris Broussard, over Toronto Raptors trade rumours, raising eyebrows on this side of the border.
articles.content:
Fox Sports pundit Chris Broussard has ruffled feathers this side of the border after comments he made about Toronto in a recent broadcast.
“It’s not America!” said Broussard. “And you feel it! Espec… [+1241 chars]

articles.title: WNBA star Brittney Griner sends letter to President Biden pleading for his help - CBC Sports
articles.description: Brittney Griner has made an appeal to President Joe Biden in a letter passed to the White House through her representatives saying she feared she might never return home and asking that he not "forget about me and the other American Detainees."
articles.content: Brittney Griner has made an appeal to President Joe Biden in a letter passed to the White House through her representatives saying she feared she might never return home and asking that he not "forge… [+3560 chars]

articles.title: Fitness crisis? Only 7% of U.S. adults have good cardiometabolic health - Study Finds
articles.description: The study found American health has been in steep decline over the last 20 years.
articles.content: MEDFORD, Mass. — More than nine in 10 American adults may want to think about skipping the summertime barbeques and go on a diet instead. A new study has found that less than seven percent of the nat… [+4023 chars]

articles.title: Hong Kong producer Raymond Wong likens Ip Man to America's Iron Man - The Star Online
articles.description: When Donnie Yen went to the US and Europe, people addressed him as Ip Man, says Wong.
articles.content:
Famous Hong Kong artiste Raymond Wong has said he is proud of the Ip Man movies (2008 to 2019) for making it big all the way to the United States and Europe.
